participants.name: Suzi Abramson-Johnson
participants.url: Former Project Manager at Verint Systems

messages.message: Thanks for letting me be your friend!  I'm still figuring out how this thing works.  I hope you're having a great time in Europe.
Thanks for the invite Brian, but I'll be partying with the "rents", trying to livin up your house.  Have fun and Happy New Year!
Hey Brian - did you get the invite for Scott's graduation party next week?  Will you be able to join us?  I hope you are enjoying life in Scottdale.  Take care, Suzi
Sorry, just saw this.  How are you?

Brian
I'm good.
Saw the pictures of Eric getting his white coat that you posted.
It was awesome.  So proud of him.  He's working really hard.
I'm sure your Mama is proud of you too.
Congrats Brian - heard the news last weekend from your Mom.  Wishing you all the best.  Hope to meet your bride soon!
